name: Protect My Beautiful Pecs
description:
Protect your divinely sculptured statue (and its pecs) as you prepare for an incoming demon horde. Your followers are a bunch of plebs and have no idea what to do, so you'll need to direct them every step of the way!

Left-click on plebs to select them, and right click to direct their path. Right-clicking on a tree will order them to harvest it, while right-clicking on the statue will cause the pleb to sacrifice itself for the greater good.

Harvesting trees and sacrificing plebs gains you religious zeal which you can use to build houses for more plebs, or for bombs to fend off the impending demon invasion.

Don't stand on your own bombs. You have 6 minutes to prepare.
